document.full_text: u.s. border police have found a sophisticated smugglers' tunnel fitted with lights, water pumps and a ventilation system running under the arizona border from mexico, authorities said on monday.
document.title: police find tunnel under arizona-mexico border
lines_and_colors: u.s. border police have found a sophisticated smugglers' tunnel fitted with lights, water pumps and a ventilation system running under the arizona border from mexico, authorities said on monday.
